document_title: Parasitic infections: Causes, signs, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content: Some parasitic diseases can be treated at home, some can be treated in the community. However, there are also many dangerous parasitic diseases that must be treated at medical facilities and according to the Ministry of Health's protocol.
subsection_title: nhiem ky sinh trung.json. Treatment of parasitic infections
subsection_data:
nhiem ky sinh trung.json. Treatment of parasitic infections
Some parasitic diseases can be treated at home, some can be treated in the community. However, there are also many dangerous parasitic diseases that must be treated at medical facilities and according to the Ministry of Health's protocol.
